entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 02:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
